name: Machoke
flavorText:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

previous.name: Machop
previous.flavorText:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

next.name: Machamp
next.flavorText:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.
